content.rendered:
Welcome to the personal website of Shankang Ke. This website uses WordPress, and the theme is GeneratePress.

I translate things from English into Chinese to spread helpful information. My current translations are mostly about free software, free culture, privacy, and security. I’m not a professional translator, though.

My email address is contact@shankangke.com. I’m trying to avoid using social media.
